text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet eHDSIOrderReason

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Illness and Disorder
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Rare Disease
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Reaction Allergy

name: EHDSIOrderReason
title: eHDSI Order Reason
description:
The Value Set is used to code clinical conditions relevant for the laboratory results interpretation.
It is defined as the union of:
(a) EHDSIIllnessandDisorder
(b) EHDSIRareDisease
(c) EHDSIReactionAllergy
(d) EHDSIExceptionalValue
